title: Representation of a normalized element
description: This represents a reference to external content that should be denormalized

type.description: The ANS type that the provider should return.

service.description: The type of interaction the provider expects. E.g., 'oembed'

id.description: The id passed to the provider to retrieve an ANS document

provider.description: A URL that can resolve the id into an ANS element

..\\traits\\trait_additional_properties..title: Has additional properties
..\\traits\\trait_additional_properties..description: A grab-bag object for non-validatable data.
